channel.title: Pay by text messag?
channel.description:
Okay so a person on my server suggested I add a way to donate to paypal via text message. As I do not have a cell phone of my own I am pretty much stupid/lost here.
1. Suggested link to get this started ? 2. Does it cost me anything , or can the payment be sent to the donor? 3. Pros/Cons?

item.title: Pay by text messag?
item.dc:creator: @patargangstar patargangstar
item.description:
@patargangstar wrote:

marcbob:

google one-bip. People can add on donations to their phone bill if that’s what you meant you needed.

dont you gotta apply for onebip? its not something you can just sign up for right? you gotta be approved to actually use it? i think i remember that from my old ps tryna get pay by mobile donation options

Read full topic

google one-bip. People can add on donations to their phone bill if that’s what you meant you needed.

item.title: Pay by text messag?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

By the looks of it that would be what I need but i still need more information about it. I don’t know anything about apps and stuff.

item.title: Pay by text messag?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

I think this is what you were reffering to?
https://personal.paypal.com/us/cgi-bin/?cmd=_render-content&content_ID=marketing_us/mobile_payments

I cba to set it up, as I only used my paypal for, around $100 worth of buying so far. If wrong, tell me, ill see what else I can lookup.

Read full topic
